name: CovAlert: A Platformer Game
description:
CovAlert: A Platformer Game is a game developed by Tiny Dino Games studio from the Philippines. We developed this game to help people on how to protect themselves during pandemics. Thank you for playing!!

LEVEL 1 TO 2 CONTROLS:

CONTROL ARROWS TO MOVE

ESC TO BACK

LEVEL 3 TO 5 CONTROLS:

CONTROL ARROWS TO MOVE

ESC TO BACK

Z TO SHOOT

FACEBOOK PAGE:
